snippet.title: Forever Skies | The Research Station Gameplay
snippet.description:
Greetings scientists!

Today, we take a deep dive into a new system previously not shown, The Research Station. In this video, we explain what you will use this machine for and how it can help you craft your own experience in Forever Skies.

Become a backer -  https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1219790675/forever-skies
Support the developers by wishlisting here - http://steam.pm/app/1641960
Join our community Discord: https://discord.gg/fnZYv9RYBJ 

In Forever Skies you are a scientist returning to Earth destroyed by a global ecological disaster. You will fly a high-tech airship, expand, rebuild and repair it. Look for and scavenge resources to survive, and face the dangers of the surface. Search for viral pathogens to cure a mysterious illness. The game will be coming to Early Access on Steam in 2023 and later to consoles.

Twitter - https://twitter.com/flyforeverskies
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/FlyForeverSkies

Visit our website to learn more about our studio: https://www.farfromhomegames.com/en
